relevant_findings.description: The right periorbital region and cheek erythematous, cervical lymph node enlarged on the left side. Appeared in respiratory distress.
relevant_findings.changes: Cervical lymphadenopathy decreased but cough and shortness of breath worsened.

relevant_findings.description: Conjunctival injection with edema, mild erythema of the right upper cheek and left tympanic membrane. Mildly enlarged, mobile, nontender anterior cervical lymph node. Mild intercostal and subcostal retractions.
relevant_findings.changes: Air entry was good but poor inspiratory effort due to chest pain; coarse breath sounds were noted.
